description: The hybrid tuberous begonia (Begonia FUNKY PINK) is an amazing species of flower because of its eye-catching bloom that stands out with its bright pink and funky colored petals. It is incredibly easy to take care of and thrives in both warm and cool temperatures, as well as in part shade. Its large showy blossoms will bloom all summer long and keep your garden looking great from spring to fall. They are also easy to propagate with cuttings and can even be grown indoors, adding a splash of unique color to any home. With its beautiful and unique blooms, the hybrid tuberous begonia is an amazing species to have in your garden.
